review_text:
From the moment I walked through the doors of Body Blast Fitness Studio, I knew I had found something special. This gym isn't just a place to work out; it's a community, a sanctuary, and truly my second home.

The atmosphere is welcoming and supportive, with trainers who remember your name and always greet you with a smile. The trainers are knowledgeable, encouraging, and genuinely invested in helping you achieve your fitness goals. Highly recommend!!
response_from_owner_text:
Thank You Isabella 
We are so happy to have you as part of our gym family ! Love you energy

review_text: There are so many amazing things to say about this gym! There are so many options for classes from strength, cardio, step, stretch and so much more. Multiple class times make it convenient for people who prefer morning or evening classes. There is no judgment whatsoever and everyone is very supportive. The teachers are fun, energetic and will keep you moving. There's always something new so your workouts don't get stagnant. So glad that I found this gem of a gym!
response_from_owner_text: Thank You so much Susan! We love having you as part of our gym family

review_text: This gym  and it's trainers are amazing.  I was new to fitness and very nervous about starting out.  I had nothing to worry about as It is such a welcoming and supporting environment.  The trainers are there to support and help you with whatever you need.  Each class is different so you never get bored with a class.
response_from_owner_text: Thank You so much for your review! We are so happy you are part of our amazing gym family

review_text: Body blast is an amazing gym. Everyone always looks out for each other. Mary is very knowledgeable. When I had surgery, Mary customized my workout experience so I could still move around. I love how inclusive the gym is..people of all age's and backgrounds attend.  100% recommend if you're looking to get a good workout and if you want a gym family

I absolutely LOVE Body Blast! They offer a great variety of classes, the trainers are attentive, friendly and fun, making each workout session enjoyable and motivating. I highly recommend this gym to anyone looking for a welcoming and dynamic fitness community!
response_from_owner_text: Thank You so much for your review

review_text:
I can't recommend this women's gym enough! My wife, Luana, has had an incredible experience here. The atmosphere is incredibly supportive, and all the women who work out there are friendly and encouraging.

The instructors are top-notch, and what truly stands out is their professionalism and readiness to assist at any fitness level. Special kudos to Mary - her classes come highly recommended!

Plus, fitness is always better with friends, so bring one or two along and embark on this journey together. It's the perfect place to reach your fitness goals while enjoying the camaraderie of like-minded women. Don't miss out!
This is a really great gym! The owner Mary does everything in her power to offer the very best classes with the most variety. I am new to this gym, but it already feels like family
response_from_owner_text: You are definitely family  Thank You so much for spreading the love

review_text: I have been to many places to exercise & this place is by far the best!  Everyone is so friendly & welcoming.  The instructors care about you & take their time to show you the proper methods.  You feel like you are part of the family here.  Plus the workouts kick butt
response_from_owner_text: Thank You so much

review_text: Always a great time picking strawberries here. Super friendly and awesome berries.

We went yesterday between 2-3...plenty of room...rows of ripe berries & easy to pick...got a small overflowing box for $6...(they also offer a large basket) There's a sink to wash your hands b4 & after...only suggestion bring a bag to put the berries in when you get it to your car so they don't roll all over. Strawberry shortcake for dessert tonight  Thanks Spring Rain !
1st time there and I loved it !   The strawberries are so juicy and delicious!    Definitely adding this to my summer activities.
response_from_owner_text: We are so encouraged to see this . It is our favorite fruit.!!!!!If you have suggestions we hope you will let us know.

review_text: Great strawberry picking!! Also they sell bacon, and we all know everything tastes better with bacon!  Great customer service.

The owners were the nicest people, I ended up having some lovely conversations. The strawberries we picked were amazing, and they sold good looking meat. I bought since bacon that was to die for. This place is everything you want from a quaint farm.
Good price! Had a fun time with my daughter
Great Starwberries, and the woman there was super kind and helpful. Can't wait to try the pork.
So sweet & delicious!  Can't beat a strawberry fresh from the farm!

This locally owned and operated gym is so much better than those impersonal "big box" gyms. I have been a member here for almost 10 years.  The facility has a full range of top-tier, well-maintained equipment and is always immaculately clean.  It's in a convenient location - easy to get to on Rte 44 and plenty of parking.  The other members are friendly and it's never too crowded, even during "peak" times.  The owner takes pride in his gym and it shows.  He also offers personal training services.  He helps keep you motivated and on track to achieve your fitness goals and see real results!

So, I wanted to add an intelligent rebuttal to an Al Nunes unintelligent, offensive and juvenile review of Creative Fitness, although his was months ago, it bothered me because I have been going to this gym for a couple of years, and train w/Eric the owner. 1st thing to clear up is you absolutely can have your phone, in your pocket w/headphones on to listen to your own music! Nobody wants to listen to someone conducting business while shouting over the background noise.  I'm not sure how other gyms are, but I doubt members are performing cartwheels with jazz hands to each machine; secure people don't draw attention to their training. Music is on a loop station,  if u don't like it, ask Eric to change it & he will! Easy fix! I chose this gym because the environment is friendly & welcoming to ALL, just not the usual jerks you'd see looking at themselves for way too long in every mirror they pass. The gym is 24/7 so if you walk in at 4am, don't expect a party, expect some tired members doing their best to be healthy & fit..Eric will always accommodate his members, & makes sure to provide the best equipment in the cleanest gym I've ever been to. GOOD business owners should be given the accolades deserved, not rantings from those that may just be envious of what they couldn't achieve,  themselves. Just sayin...

I work out of town, so half the battle is to find a good gym.  It is small, but it has everything you need and equipment is top notch.  Eric, (the owner) has a great attitude and makes you feel at home.  Plus, he did not charge me a joining fee.  Wish I could take the gym back home with me.   This gym is a hidden gem.
Very clean and open 24 hours. Not too crowded and also affordable. The owner, Eric, is always available to help guide you or answer questions. Highly recommend!
Small gym, but is truly 24 hours. Only staffed at certain times, you get a keycard to get in off hours. Easy to join and easy to stop membership if you want. Owner is very nice.

It's a great gym. Small, but has all the workout equipment you could need and it's never very crowded. Open around the clock every day. If you go at an odd hour, there's a fair chance you'll get the whole place to yourself.

I have been training here for about 5 years in a personal training setting.  Eric's personal training is outstanding.  I'm a very busy professional and Eric designs amazing workouts in the time I have available, which has varied from 2 - 5 session per week.  The equipment is unparalleled.  Creative Fitness 24/7 has access to the best equipment available and it is constantly being upgraded and exchanged.  There is big indoor jungle gym setup in the back room which is the equivalent of one of those "American Gladiator" things.  When we were training for the Tough Mudder we used it.

The gym and bathroom shower area is always impeccable. I'd love to come in more often on my off hours to do more cardio, which is available to me as a personal training client.  The ellipticals and treadmills appear to be brand new.

Deadest, most low energy vibe of any gym I've ever been in. Unfriendly zombies wandering machine to machine. Mediocre, random equipment. Negative and condescending signs all over the place, including one saying they'd throw out people for using their cell phone. Really? Guess you're stuck listening to the lame repetitive alt  music playing 24-7? Coulda been decent, but just a weird culture there.
Great place to shoot for a day. There are 50, 100, and 300M ranges, but you have to qualify to use the 300M.

Nice range, upkeep is awesome, staff needs to learn to speak and listen with respect. No place for persons with anger issues. Have had a few bad experiences we all understand that safety is paramount and a range officer is in charge but respect is earned by showing respect, not by screaming and yelling and using foul language to members and their guests. I have witnessed this behavior to myself and others.
I am a retired SFC from US Army and some of the conduct is really out of bounds.

I came here with two of my best friends and I really enjoyed myself, staying for over 3 hours in the blazing sun, but we didn't care because we were shooting guns and enjoying each other' company in the process.

My only issue with the range was that there were three areas that you could shoot down range and there always seemed to be someone waiting in their truck for us to hurry up and finish our session, somewhat nerve wracking when you just want to take your time and enjoy what you're doing. I thought the security however was very good and I felt safe when on the range.

Members only - this is not a rental range.

Outdoor range is open from 9 AM [10 AM Sundays] until Sundown - Google won't let me just enter an opening time.

Excellent facility with multiple 100 and 50 yard ranges, trap field, and 300 yard range.
Affordable, plenty of space. Everyone i have met is quite nice.
Sunday morning trap shoot open to the public.  Lots of fun.
Great place to shoot off steam and have a blast.
Love the place had lots of fun!
First time visiting this library. What a great place! The staff was so nice and helpful and the selection of the books in the subject I was looking for is immense!

Terrible staff of people. They literally lied to me about using their computers and then someone kept turning off my computer access.  At the same time, their staff literally took my USB off of the computer, knowing that it could cause computer damage. I just wish there was one place where libraries didn't rule the world of discriminatory abuse, as it always seems to happen to me. Terrible. Then the maintenance asked me if the door was what I was looking for. WoW?

This is an EXCEPTIONAL library with kind and knowledgeable staff. The events that are held are engaging and fun for all ages! They have everything from switch games to audio books to museum passes. Highly recommended!

I have not been to The Taunton Library in several years and saw many positive changes. It used to be a hostile environment with the security guards on duty. Not sure where they went but it has made a positive impact on the environment. It seems that maybe they were never needed as the people I see are respecting the rules, which have also relaxed to even bring water into the library. It was a positive decision to reduce what felt like a military presence within a public place where people come with good intentions. I stop in now between appointments to read and enjoy reading an old fashioned newspaper!!
Great library here. Called for a title search, they had it, I requested the book be put on hold to pick up the next day. Done. A very pleasant experience.

Beautiful library in & the staff is extremely helpful and they helped get us a new card because we lost it and they kindly waived the $1 fee because I brought no cash to library! I was so excited that the brand new book that just came out that I wanted was at the library !  I didn't have to purchase it on Amazon. Definitely a win on that!! Also they have a 3-D printer you can you for FREE!
Nothing beats a real book and a quiet place to read!! Love the library

As always we love visiting our library. This time my son and I explored the upstairs and didn't realize how large it actually is. We always love visiting the children's room, visiting with our favorite librarian Marybeth and joining any activity we can!

Honestly this is the first place I ever been that didn't try to make you buy things you don't need. They have a process of getting to know you and your needs before they show you what aligns. The owner was extremely caring and personally went out her way. I'll be back for yoga classes because I felt so comfortable and got new knowledge I know it will help me out in my life. Thank you for this experience
response_from_owner_text: We're so happy you enjoyed your experience Ameer! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

review_text: I have been visiting ODYS for a few months and attend the Wednesday night class.  I feel so much relief and balance after class and Mike is extremely dialed in and a great instructor.  I have added this weekly yoga class to my exercise routine and can't do without it.  Thank you so much
response_from_owner_text: So happy you're enjoying your practice at the studio!

review_text: Great shop with great gifts and super friendly staff! I'm always treated very kind when I go in and the staff is very accommodating! Highly recommend this shop for your spiritual needs and or gifts for those crystal lovers in your life.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you John! So happy you enjoyed your experience at the shop. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

review_text: Open Doors in Taunton is the absolute best. I just started back up again after any years off. This is my happy place. The practice of yoga, the new friends and the fantastic teachers. A big shout out to the owners Mike and Marilva for having the community classes. It makes my heart happy. One of my favorite things is having that nice cool cloth with the amazing essential oils at the end of class. Thank you!!!!!
response_from_owner_text: Welcome back Kara!! Thank you so much for the kind words as well. So glad you're enjoying your practice at the studio.

review_text: I love this yoga studio!! I feel so much better after each practice. The instructors are great and the studio is so inviting. Such good vibes!
response_from_owner_text: We're so happy you're enjoying your practice in the studio and this amazing community.

review_text: I absolutely love this place, such a peaceful center to gain your perspective in reality. I have gone for a little amount of time and has only seen myself get stronger. Kayla, Meg, and Jess are amazing teachers who help you complete your practice how you feel! Anyone looking for a great place to start hot yoga this is the place!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Victoria! We are so happy to have you as part of our community. Thank you for practicing with us.

review_text: I've had nothing but great experiences at Open Doors. Though I've only had a couple of instructors, Susan is my favorite! She sets a calm, focused, open, and accepting atmosphere and her kindness vibrates throughout the room. The all-levels and mid-level heated classes are always just challenging enough for me (someone who has a casual, on again/off again relationship with yoga). The owners are quite lovely too! Everyone I've encountered is very kind. I highly recommend checking it out for yourself!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Nicole!

review_text: Such an amazing space  I feel absolutely fortunate to have Open Doors Studio so close by. Easy parking in several public lots as well as metered street parking. The new retail location offers a great variety of incense, candles, teas, tarot and more! Not to mention their expanded class offerings. Seriously something for everyone!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sadye! We're so happy you enjoy the space.

review_text:
They are so awesome, caring, considerate.
Leave my brother there five days a week.
He has great care and help. The staff is superb

I have been working with Chad and I'm impressed with how he tailors each exercise routine to meet my needs. He is very organized and comes to each session prepared with a new exercise program. He keeps things interesting so you will not get bored and your body will not get used to the exercises. I had a fitness assessment done recently and I was pretty nervous about it since I'm not in great shape these days. I was relieved to be put at ease immediately by Chad's manner & friendliness. The whole experience has been really good for me. After he gave me my follow up report, I walked away feeling like I had a better understanding of where I'm at right now and how he could help me move into where I want to be. He is a very honest person and definitely knows what he is talking about because it shows. He knows the difference between what actually works and what is complete b.s.
I'd recommend him to anyone who is serious about making positive, healthy changes in order to become the best you and who also isn't afraid of hard work. :o)

Sudden Impact Martial Arts & Personal Training is a one of a kind gym.  I work with the owner (Chad) once a week and with just one day a week i've gotten immaculate results I've changed my fat to muscle ratio completely. i used to weigh 201 pounds with what i would say maybe 45% body fat and only 55 % muscle, bone, organs ok i think anyone whose reading this gets the point.  But now i weigh 197 and I'm about 27-29 % body fat and the rest muscle. Sudden Impact is the best place to go for the training you want in Massachusetts hands down.  Oh i almost forgot, Sudden Impact is also a very fun and entertaining workout. Chad makes the workouts fun, entertaining, and making you want to workout more and more. My Name is Brett Gussoff and I feel stronger, lighter, and also mentally. I suffered from deep depression and after i see Chad i feel like i have unlimited never-ending happiness.

Chad is a great trainer and really cares about the goals of his students. I've been training with him for about six months and his dedication is infectious. I love that he works with kids in the community aswell.

Chad Ellis and Sudden impact martial arts have completely changed my life, I have lost weight, gained back my confidence and learned several deadly arts in the process, Chad is a great teacher with a lot of passion for what he does, I highly recommend this school to anyone looking to get in better shape and have more confidence in themselves.

This place looks like the place to be come summer, with a generous splash pad, a dozen or so picnic tables and grills, a wide field, and tons of hiking trails.

I will say though...hunting?!?!  I am not anti-hunting, but it would be nice to know it wasn't a possibility year-round at a state park.  It literally says to wear bright colors so you don't get shot!

Other than THAT, which I have no insider knowledge of how prevalent it is or not, I really enjoyed my trip.

I especially liked that all dogs I saw were leashed, which is a rule at DCR parks, but not always enforced or followed.  Thank you!!!!

And there are bathrooms open, but they closed well before the park did.

Cool history and very accessible.  Even the trails aren't super bumpy.
I came here looking for pukwudgie and any other Bridgewater Triangle spooks and goblins. I heard some strange noises, but did not see any tiny humanoids. Still a great walk through the forest though!
I have been coming here since I was a kid, when you had the pool. I find it very peaceful and great for the kids and pets.

Great place to take children of all ages! Amazing hiking/walking trails. If you like the nature and everything that comes with it you'll love the trails. Also has a wading pool for children and parents. They also have sites where you can set up for the day with charcoal grills. Bathrooms on site.
They allow hunting here so just be careful.  Beautiful place for hiking.

Pretty good hike! There's definite evidence of extracurricular activities in the forest, but don't let that stop you from climbing to the top of profile rock or exploring the trails. Tons of evergreen trees. Pictures are of the view from the top of the rock. Be careful as private property does border the forest in several locations

Nice place to hike in the summer, fall, winter, and spring dont get lost however use maps if needed, I was able to still get celluar service on cell phone throughout the trails. You would also see motorcross bike trails as well, and occasional wildlife. Great place to barbecue with picnic benches and if you have kids it have a nice waddling pool for small children.

Update,
Folks I drive a Acura rsx. A little sports coupe. I drove through every single trail this park had to offer. It's all totally accessible, and the pot holes are a test of your skills and mettle as a driver. the peace of mind is unreal and you see absolutely no one. Let alone its a major part of the "bridge water triangle" get in here folks and live !

The Rink was smaller , a bit dated , plenty of parking, seating areas on each side and lobby.
Food and beverage options limited to vending machines and small snack bar.

My son Nason Brown ice skated here .
He loves  hockey and  learned alot!
TY

My daughter had ice skating with her girlscout troop here. Employees were very nice. Rink was in good condition.The people coming in next at the end of our time were very rude. They thought their little hockey game was more important than what the girl scouts were doing. They are kids activities. People need to chill out

I only went once as a kid and it was the best time but the place was packed when I drove by today! Business definitely picked back up since covid and that makes me so happy to see cause its such a nice place to go.
Grandson in learn to play hockey program .He loves it . Just resigned for 9 more weeks . They get alot out of this  I enjoyed every minute!
Another FMC rink, with ample parking in back
Had a great time skating with my friend Katie.

Typical state rink... Clean establishment but:
Poor ice most times. Extremely small locker rooms.

Who knew that 6 months ago dropping a pair of cleats off to a friend's daughter would get my butt and head back to where it needed to be! A strong support system is EVERYTHING when you have a goal in mind. @sheepdog.athletics coaches and members have created the most enjoyable environment for me AND MY FAMILY to find our love of fitness again  Their entire gym & programming is designed to make you comfortable in every aspect. Health concerns? Need direction in your daily diet? Looking for competition? Need accountability? Personalized meal plans and workout programs? They got it and they get you the results you desire!

Can't wait to see what another 6 months brings!!

I could not be happier with my decision to join this gym! The atmosphere is welcoming and supportive, every class has people cheering each other on, and the coaches are great about answering questions about movements and giving tips on form. I am stronger now, both physically and mentally, than I have ever been. I highly recommend Sheepdog Athletics to anyone with any type of fitness goals!

I started my journey at Sheepdog right before making the decision to undergo gastric bypass & change my life. I knew Tonya from going to high school together & came in for a consult before surgery to see about personal training options once I was cleared for physical activity post op. As someone who was considered "morbidly obese" for most of my adult life & had never been physically active due to that, I spent an entire year training one on one with Tonya learning how to get range of motion & learning to navigate an entirely new world in my new body.

To say this changed my life would be a huge understatement. Tonya helped redefine my life, my attitude towards the gym/working out & helped me become the person I am today; Someone who is proud to come to the gym, someone who loves to move her body, someone who feels strong & excited to be living a completely different, happier and active life.. All the things I dreamed of for so long. I couldn't have done this without Tonya by my side through it all.

After a year of personal training, I started hybrid training classes which opened me up to a community of people who have cheered me on, pushed me, supported me and truly inspired me to keep up with my lifestyle & goals. I cannot recommend Sheepdog enough- Tonya & Dan are top notch people who work hard to help you achieve your goals. Their dedication to their members & their gym goes above & beyond!!

i love this gym. the programming is unique and gets you results. the coaches are amazing and always rooting for you. ive done so many things in the past few years i never thought i was even capable of. what i love most is its like a family there, everyone is always cheering each other on and helping each other to be better!

I walked into Sheepdog just after the holidays with one goal in mind: tone up for my summer wedding.

I told Tonya I wasn't so worried about my weight but more about looking and feeling confident in all of my wedding festivities, but mostly my wedding dress.

Then my bridal shower dress was too big. Then my wedding dress needed to be taken in. That's when I saw results.

I thought Tonya would just tell me how to work out- but our training sessions went beyond that. She not only taught me the fundamentals about proper nutrition to fuel my weight lifting, but also gave me sample meals, recipes, and motivation to eat well. We got as specific on where to buy food, which protein was the cheapest at which grocery store, and what flavors we liked in certain meals. Her guidance completely changed how I look at and navigate food and eating. In my 20+ weeks of training, I learned how to properly fuel my body and saw the direct results Tonya said I would see when I abided by her code.

In the gym, I felt myself completely transform. Even when I didn't workout with Tonya, I heard her in my head, either with the tailored videos she constantly sent me, or figuratively coaching me through sets as I imagined her in my head pushing me.

I constantly yearned to workout, and made myself workout even on the toughest days. I lifted hard and heavy, which was something I had never done before.

In terms of personalization in my personal training- I threw every possible obstacle at Tonya- multiple injuries, a bad reaction to antibiotics, and a total career change- all mid-season. Tonya met every challenge head-on WITH me, and catered my nutrition and workout plans and goals accordingly.

I made tons of mistakes- from completely skipping workouts to eating share size bags of skittles in one sitting, but Tonya never once judged me or shamed me. We pushed through these little fails together and continues to reach my goals.

I can not recommend the personal training program at Sheepdog athletics enough.

This place is Awesome! worth every penny! if you stay consistent and put in the work you will start seeing results! They motivate you and the exercises are challenging but you feel great after! I recommend it 100%! The people are so nice! i been loving my experience in this gym and will stick with it as long as i can!

Had to leave a review because we are moving and we wish we could take this gym with us. This place was so amazing, I'm planning to make the long drive every couple of weeks. In a few months I got a lot stronger but more importantly less hurt than I would at other gyms. They actually help you with your form and guide you through the workouts. We were worried when they brought in new coaches, but they are just as awesome. Make sure to visit coach Ryan in the 7 a.m. class, that's the best group. If you want a great gym with a solid community that makes you feel good, go here! We are going to miss this place!

Sheepdog Athletics is more than just a gym. It's a place to call home. No matter what your health and wellness goals are, no matter what levels of fitness experience you have, no matter your size, shape, age, injuries, Tonya and Dan will meet you where you are and inspire you to set and reach attainable goals. They are extremely knowledgeable, supportive and professional. Not only have I far exceeded my expectations physically over the past 2 years, but I've meet others people who are on their own wellness journey that I can now call best friends and family. Sheepdog is a hidden gem of downtown Taunton and if you are looking for a place to feel welcomed and instantly part of a community you'll want to contact them right now.

We were in the area and looking for things to do when we came across Deep Pond Farm. I'm an animal lover and had a great time! It's free to go in and see the animals. When some of the animals get close enough you can manage to pet them, like the horses, donkeys, and goats. All of the animals looked clean and well taken care of!

We had no idea but there were actually day old baby goats when we visited! They were some of the cutest things I've ever seen!!

The bar was really nice too. It seems to be built around trees which was cool. Some awesome woodwork to see with the benches, chairs, and stools. I had a glass of their Deep Pond brand wine and it was delicious!

We saw they have live music sometimes so we plan to go back! It's around 30-40 minutes for us but we really enjoyed it! If it was closer I could see us becoming regulars. There were families with kids, couples, and groups of guys having beers at the bar. Just seems like a great place to hang out and enjoy the outdoors and some adorable animals.

Really cool concept and the owners seem like a great family if you read their story on the website.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review !!!

review_text:
Great place to visit.  Thinking we might make a Christmas tradition of visiting every year.
Forgot to add: definitely try the food truck while you're there. Family tried the hot dogs and chicken tenders and said they were great.  Personally, I highly recommend the churros and hot apple cider.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review !!!

review_text: Such a beautiful farm! So much fun for kids and all ages. Many different unique animals and also the normal cow, horses, and goats. All the animals are well taken care of and have plenty of space to enjoy. I love how this farm opens up to the community and holds events for all. Entrance is free which I think is great as I work with children therapeutically and it's a great spot for us. Can't thank enough all who run this place to make it possible
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your review !

review_text: Wonderful place. If you like being outdoors, country music, the farm and great bar staff then this is the place to be! Food truck may have a little wait, but the food is well worth that wait. Bar also has a great drink menu.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review !!!

review_text: This place was so cute.  They had animals and live music and food.  Pony rides.  I went with teens and a baby but I could also easily see me sitting there with a group of friends around the fire having a few drinks listening to the singer.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review !

review_text: Absolutely beautiful place to have a beer or cocktail and listen to some live music. Full bar and food truck and lots of gorgeous animals!

review_text: Stopped by for a visit after hearing about this beautiful place from friends.. Had a great time with wife patting horses and seeing puppies and every other imaginable farm animal... And to boot they had music and adult beverages and food...Can't wait to come back...

review_text: We went for a tree! The tree was a great price and so fresh! We got some food from the truck and it was delicious. They were very helpful, kind, and reasonably priced.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review !

review_text: My two daughters enjoy the experience of outdoor learning, free play and signing story time! So much fun and highly recommend it! Michelle the leader is incredible!
My kids have enjoyed the homeschool and preschool classes. They are great with the kids, and have a beautiful, fun, and safe property.  My children love their programs.
Back to nature awesomeness for the little ones <3

I have been going to this Portuguese Catholic Church all my life. It is my favorite. Priests and other members are always helpful and friendly.  Many events as well as the usual activities. I've been to different churches due to different reasons, but I will stay a member as long as I am able.
It's a beautiful Church, it's full of peace it's a great asset to the community, it does great charity work. It helps the homeless it helps the needy. Couldn't say anything more about it

Very nice parish
Letting st Mary's use it until our boiler is replaced at st marys

St Anthony's Parish Church is the best church ever. I love this church so much. I've been coming to this church sense I was born. I think that people should come to this church is because it is very beautiful and a nice church. We do activities here. We do dinners, processions, etc. We do CCD class for the kids. The Masses are very nice. This is why I Love this church so much. Feel free to come to St Anthony's church.

Thursday 8: am very wonderful mass,
After mass parishioners singing
The rosary
St ANTHONY know all my problem .i can't live without st ANTHONY .the love of my life my peace .when i lost my father i didn't have anyone to go to
Excellent choice for a place to pray or sit
Great pastor, Fr. Freddie

Loved this museum! A modest collection with some surprising gems, very well maintained and interesting. The kids and I learned a lot. My curiosity was piqued on one subject in particular, which prompted me to purchase a book from their gift corner, which I hadn't planned on doing.
The staff was very friendly and accommodating. My 14-year-old son is into genealogy and they were great about setting him up in the research library.
After our visit we asked if there was anything else of interest in the area (as we are from out of state) and a local event was suggested - which turned out to be amazing! All around, a great experience.
I highly recommend this quaint, immaculate, informative museum.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! So glad you had as great visit to Taunton and enjoyed the OCHM. We love hearing about when people enjoy their visit--thank you!

review_text: Happened across this gem of a museum while traipsing the back way from Providence, Rhode Island. The staff was very friendly, even giving tips on genealogical research in the area. The exhibits are beautifully organized and displayed. It covers so many time periods, and offers something for everyone.
response_from_owner_text: So glad to hear you enjoyed your visit!

review_text: Great way to get in touch with your roots.
response_from_owner_text: We love helping people discover their history! Thanks for visiting.

review_text: Beautiful museum with many interesting artifacts on display with a welcoming and helpful staff. Research library really worked to provide historical information I was looking for. Will return in the future.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for your kind words. Can't wait to welcome you back.

review_text: It was fascinating to see all the artifacts, and exhibits on the history of the Old Colony. And the research/library room was extremely useful, and helped a lot with my personal research.
response_from_owner_text: So glad you had a great visit! Thanks for sharing.

review_text: This was such a cool place to visit. The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and kind. I brought my elderly mom & Aunt only to discover the majority of the collection is upstairs and there's no elevator.  One member occupied them while I ran up to view the upstairs with another staffer. I learned a great deal. My favorite was the silver collection...it is the silver city after all. There is no charge, but a donation is greatly appreciated.  Check it out.
Nice museum with a good selection of items. We had a nice visit.
response_from_owner_text: So glad you enjoyed your visit!

review_text: Very nice and knowledgeable young man gave us his time and assistance  today. No definite answer to our family quest..but we now have a new hint to follow up on.  Lovely museum..thank you!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for visiting! Hope to see you again soon!

review_text:
Staff is non responsive, and they allow group workouts despite there being signage up declaring no personal training.....
The gym is already small, we don't need a group of people hogging the machines during the most busiest hours of the day. Please be more attentive, as I will be cancelling my membership if this is not addressed sooner rather than later
response_from_owner_text: Hi there, Cynthia! We regret to hear about your experience. We never want our members or guests to have a less-than-stellar experience at our Planet. If you haven't already, we kindly ask that you bring your concerns to the attention of our club manager. Our club manager is the best point of contact to address your concerns in a timely manner. Thank you!

review_text: I try to go off hours so it isn't very busy. Around 10-2pm. For the most part, everything is clean. I would like to see the handles and attachments get replaced. They are frayed or missing all together. But 98% of equipment is always functional. The new massage chairs they got in recently are much better than the old ones.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Stephen, thanks for the review and the kind words! We appreciate the feedback and we take it very seriously. We try our best to provide the best gym experience we can to our members so if there's anything we can do to make your experience better, be sure to speak to one of our club managers in-club. Thank you again and we hope you have a great day!

review_text: Like this gym cuz it's close to my place of work but I do not like how they are raising Price of reg membership to 15$ and can't even keep up with some maintenance.Peck fly machine has been down for over  3 weeks now.Im usually not one to complain but if you're gonna raise prices atleast keep up with the maintenance
response_from_owner_text: Hi, Lucas! Please know that the price increase will be for new members only, existing Classic Card members will not be impacted by this price change. Also, thank you for taking the time to inform us of the equipment issue. Please know we take broken equipment concerns very seriously, as our members' safety is most important. If you haven't already, please speak to your club manager directly as they would be best equipped to rectify this, or maybe even provide you with an ETA for when it will be fixed. Managers are best reached Monday - Friday, from 9:30 AM to 4:00 PM. We hope this helps!

review_text: This location isn't the best. Most of the paper towel dispensers around the gym don't function . The staff here also do not enforce that people wipe down the equipment after using it.  Lots of machines are out of order all around the gym. I saw an elderly woman lose her footing and fly off of a treadmill that is located right in front of the desk. Not a single employee even spoke to her or helped her .
response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicole, thanks for the review! We appreciate the feedback and we take it very seriously. We try our best to provide the best gym experience we can to our members so if there's anything we can do to make your experience better, be sure to speak to one of our club managers in-club. Thank you again and we hope you have a great day!

review_text:
You can't beat Planet Fitness at all. Great all around. Great equipment for a low monthly fee. Plus, you are not stuck in a contract. I Highly recommend it.
Mr. V Sensei
response_from_owner_text: We are grateful for your excellent 5-star feedback, Doug! Our goal is to offer a top-notch experience at a reasonable rate for our members, and we are excited to have you back at our Planet soon.

review_text: I like Planet Fitness, always with positive points in Quincy, Weymouth , Hingham, but it's in Tauton. It's awful equipment, broken for a decade to fix dirty bathrooms, very bad.
response_from_owner_text: We're sad to hear you had such a poor experience working out with us, Jordan. If you haven't already, we strongly encourage you to share your thoughts with our club's manager directly, so that they can work with our front desk staff to remedy these cleanliness issues. Please feel free to reach out to them at your earliest convenience- They are available at our front desk on weekdays from 9 AM to 4 PM.

review_text: Hate this gym! Love planet fitness but this one in particular is awful. Not enough resistance machines. And way way too many people. Parking lot is a nightmare. Been in 3 accidents. This gym is closer to the lower income. And I am in no way a rich person myself  I am also low income. But the people that this one in particular are nasty rude. Don't clean up after themselves. The girls are gross period products that are used left in shower stalls. I only come here if I have too and even then make it a quick workout. Middleboro is by far better
response_from_owner_text: We're saddened to hear about your experience, and we appreciate you sharing your concerns. Your feedback is important to us, and we want to address these issues promptly. To ensure your concerns are properly addressed, we recommend informing our club manager about your specific experiences at this location. They will investigate and work to improve the situation, addressing the cleanliness, equipment availability, and overall atmosphere.

review_text: I've been a member here since 2018, as the staff has always been friendly and this particular PF continuously makes efforts to improve (expanding and adding that other room, adding more treadmills, installing new weight racks). However, lately I haven't been impressed with the customer service. There seems to always be a new glass bottle shattered in the parking lot, and the staff NEVER cleans it up. I understand if it continues to happen it can be frustrating, but when it is crowded and that is the only spot to park in, I don't want to pop my tires. It also is alarming because you can't even see until you pull into the spot with the massive glass shards! Secondly, the staff has always been amazing. Lately, though, there has been new and younger kids working which some of them are great, but the majority stand there chatting amongst themselves failing to greet members coming and going, which was always my favorite part about being a member there. On multiple occasions I've said hello and goodbye, without hearing anything from the workers... they just stand and stare or are too busy on their phones/gossiping. The girls seem to stand in groups behind the desk and one of the nights I went, they were too busy flirting with a male member to answer a question I had regarding my husbands membership. He stood at the other side of the desk chatting with them for well over 30 minutes which screams unprofessional to me. I would love to see more doing and less socialization... I don't feel nearly as welcome as I used to with Tyler and the old staff. Please consult the new team about being more friendly and helpful, as I know they are capable.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Susan, thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention and being honest regarding your experience at Planet Fitness. We understand that the parking lot can be an inconvenience but that is under the management of the Thomas Place ownership company and is not within the jurisdiction of Planet Fitness. Our staff is only obligated to handle any issues within the club itself. When it comes to staff not meeting our set standards, we urge you to bring it to the attention of your club's management team and they will be able to work with you and their team on this directly. We appreciate you being a member at our Planet and are excited to see you again soon!

review_text: My granddaughter Mia, who is 5 years old starting taking riding lessons this past fall and what a wonderful experience it is to see her learning how to care and respect a beautiful horse. Before her lessons begin she must brush and clean her horse all awhile learning the names of the brushes and the other equipment she uses to care for her horse! Mia absolutely loves knowing she is going to ride, the owners daughter is a very helpful and caring young lady she definitely loves her horses and she is very passionate about teaching Mia the right way to care for your horse. It's a great place and definitely worth checking out. I was amazed how beautiful and big this farm is right here in Taunton,  it's definitely a hidden gem I highly recommend checking it out you won't be disappointed
Such a lovely farm... great place for lessons
No days off on the farm, the boys are power washing stalls as I type they never stop ! God bless em !!

It's so nice and relaxing there.
Horses, cows ,chickens ,goats,dogs.
Oh yeah,Geese and a Crane.
In Taunton yet!
Pine Hill Farms is Taunton's finest and best and family will enjoy visiting there.
Just wondering if you can walk in and see all thr animals they have and ?,
Excellent  people, excellent horse care!
The owners care

So much fun! great vibe and friendly staff. BYOB wine and beer only and they provide ice buckets. They also have a snack bar.
It was our first time here for a birthday and look forward to returning! Highly recommend!
response_from_owner_text: Hey Christina!  Omg you are giving us such big warm and fuzzies!  Totally love everything that you are saying and so appreciate you saying it!  We at Stumpys look forward to seeing you back here slaying it.  Who knows?  Maybe you will be one of our regulars?

review_text: Extremely affordable cost-effective for all family types couples I went with My Wife the staff was very informative. Went over safety precautions, proper body mechanics. The whole experience was new and fun and definitely would come back on multiple occasions for any occasion if you're looking to have fun for an hour or a couple hours. This is definitely a place to go go.
response_from_owner_text: Charles!  We love you and you are always welcome to come back anytime!  You and your wifey kick AXE!  Made it so easy to teach you.  Keep slaying life!

review_text: A lot of fun here at Stumpy's. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We had a great time throwing axes. Will definitely be back to do it again!
response_from_owner_text: Love the pics you posted Sarah and love the wonderful review you dropped on us.  We are truly grateful for both and will love having you back in to throw some more.  BTW we love how kind and helpful our staff are too!

review_text: Owners seem nice, but the staff is weird and it was just an uncomfortable experience. Sat in the lobby trying to get help for a while. They fit us in and then theres a photo shoot and some guy taking his shirt off or something in the spot that they said was for us. We get to throw and theres this old guy in a red hat standing behind my girlfriend intently watching her. Then the slot gets taken over by the staff for the photo shoot again. Again, ownership seems nice but overall a weird and uncomfortable experience.
response_from_owner_text: Our sincerest apologies.  The photographer seemed unaware that you were guests.  I was unaware of this until it was too late.  We hope you will give us another chance as we pride ourselves on consistently providing 5 star experiences.  We chose yesterday for the photo shoot which is part of a state tourism campaign since we typically are slow on a Sunday evening.  Of course Murphys Law would prove otherwise.  Once again, we are terribly sorry for the awkward events that took place last night and hope you will give us another chance .  Wishing you the best.

review_text: Wait time wasn't the best, but that's because it's a popular place. It's definitely worth the wait. Staff was polite and helpful when needed. The amount of lane time was much better than other axe throwing places I've been to as well. Great place to spend time and have fun with friends or family.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Ryan - a big thanks for dropping this review.  Guessing you came in on a weekend night when The House is rocking full tilt.  So happy to hear that your wait to get throwing was well worth it.  Glad you recognize that Stumpy's gives groups ample time in the pit.  We've been to other places and agree that they push you out just at the point you are starting to have fun.  Not our goal.  We want you to feel relAXED (sorry it's too easy to pop a pun in) and enjoying time with your crew.  Hope we see you back here soon and we become your regular hang out .  If you want a more low key AXEperience, drop in on a weeknight or on a weekend day.  But of course if you prefer a big party atmosphere- weekend nights are what you want

review_text: First timer lol. ByoB is the best thing. The works there r excellent.  Doof gave us a great lesson and was chill dude. We enjoyed the time there great place for adults with a inner child. Will def be back with others.
response_from_owner_text: OMG this has gotta be the best review ever.  Thank you soooo much and so happy you loved us.  Can't wait to see you back here again!

review_text: I wish it was a little cheaper for 1 hour, but oh well. The ladies were friendly and helpful with their training. The decor was great. Today was our first time here. You can do an hour or 2 hours. They have private party prices too. Bring your own beer or wine and they give u a bucket of ice. We had a fun time. It's harder than you'd expect. I did get 2 bullseyes though. Their games were fun too. Jenga, a ring toss, and connect four just to name a few.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Amy!  Glad you guys had fun.  Come in on a Wednesday for 20% off your throwing fees or wear any Stumpy's wearable in on any Thursday for 20% off.  Hope to see you all again.

review_text:
Stop your search! If you're looking for something fun and new to do on a "date night", birthday or just to do something different this is the place!
The vibe is awesome - BYOB (beer and wine only) which they throw on ice for you as they set up your spot. Each "cage" where you or your group is assigned has two targets and hatchets. Easy tutorial and much safer than you'd think. I was skeptical at first about safety but not a problem! We celebrated a friends birthday there and she even got to leave with a cool little keepsake (I'll leave that a surprise!)
You can also hang around and finish your beers when your time is up at one of the lounge areas. Couches, tables, music and of course - my favorite- giant Jenga! As well as other cool table games.
I could go on and on but you've gotta try it! If you're sick of doing the same thing but you aren't into the club scene or bar scene this place brings excitement, fun and privacy (if you want it) all at one spot.
Parking is good and the restaurant next door is great as well!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for such an amazing shout out Amanda!  Come on back soon!!!!

review_text: My favorite place in Fall River -- Whether it's to go for a walk/jog, read a book, or watch the sunset. You will definitely catch a beautiful warm sunset during summer. It's doesn't get crowded during the daytime but as soon as it's the evening it can become a little crowded. There's also a close by ice cream shop.

Parking can sometimes be a little tricky, but this is a beautiful area to sit and eat and enjoy the waterfront tucked away in Fall River. The high quality of the boardwalk and the cleanliness is very noteworthy.  The display inside the museum and the movies that they offer for free make for an interesting day. You can actually spend a full day here between Battleship Cove and walking the park and having some lunch and enjoying the history and heritage that makes this city great.

This dog friendly public park has great parking, spots to play frisbee or lounge in the sun as well as grill and walk along the river. You'll be able to see the naval ships and can even pay for a tour on one.
6/23  Captain Thomas Hudner Memorial Building. Outstanding Fall River history lessons live here.
At the time we visited, it was very peaceful and relaxing. The small visitor's center includes an exhibit detailing the city's history.

The Heritage Museum almost feels like a visitor center or a help desk at Battleship Cove. They have a beautiful interior with lots of historical photographs and displays like you would see in a very small wing of a museum. But the building is air conditioned and the unisex bathroom is right outside the main entrance.
Great view , free parking , picnic area , and stores and restaurants not too far . A great place to stob by if your driving through !
It's OK. They need to clean it up a little more. Fall River is a dump. But, this area of town is ok. Won't be back.

Our overnight stay at Kevin's Lighthouse was nothing short of magical! The warm and inviting atmosphere provided an authentic glimpse into the lives of the historic light keepers. The boat ride to the lighthouse was thrilling, and learning about its rich history added to the enchantment.

Kevin's dedication to preserving the lighthouse and sharing its beauty with others is truly commendable. Despite the weather not being ideal, it only enhanced the authenticity of the experience, making us feel like genuine light keepers.

The photos Kevin took to commemorate our visit were exquisite and will be treasured forever. We cannot thank him enough for providing such a memorable and unforgettable experience. Five stars all around!

- John and Marci MacDonald

Amazing experience!  Wonderful hosts!  We flew in from Florida to stay at the Borden Flats lighthouse over a weekend in April of this year and had an awesome time!  The lighthouse decor has an antique and cozy feel, we were instantly right at home.  The weather was cool yet comfortable, we used the furnaces in the evenings which made things that much more cozy.  We ordered all of our food for the weekend through Paul, he was extremely accommodating.  Everything we ordered was wonderfully packaged and delicious, 5 star all the way!   Kevin was in touch throughout the trip and went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable!  If you are thinking about booking a trip to the Borden Flats Lighthouse, just do it, you won't regret it!  This is a one-of-a-kind experience, truly!  Thank you for a wonderful time Kevin, Paul, John Paul and Lucy! We will be back!

We spent 2 nights at this beautiful paradise on the water. We loved sitting out on the deck watching the boats and water go by, it was so relaxing being "off the grid". Kevin was so accommodating, he definitely made sure we had everything we needed and the history he told us behind the Light was so fascinating. The weather wasn't very cooperative but it didn't matter we just bundled up because when you're looking at those gorgeous views you forget how cool or wet you are lol. We used the heaters when we were inside which made it nice and cozy. We are definitely going back and staying 2 nights again because 1 night is not enough! It's been a week since we've been back home and we still can't keep talking about it. Thank you Kevin, John Paul, and Lucy for sharing your beautiful lighthouse with us!! We will see you again soon!! I definitely, without a doubt, recommend visiting, you won't regret it for a second!

What a wonderful visit!!!!

In the days leading up to our stay, Kevin was in touch as the weather was not looking good.  We took the chance and the weather held out for us. Paul got us out to this paradise and we had a wonderful overnight stay.  Steaks on the grill watching a beautiful sunset.  Morning coffee watching the boats race on the river.  SO RELAXING!!!!!!

A one of a kind experience!!!!!!!

Had the privilege of staying in the Borden flats lighthouse on our 10th wedding anniversary. Most lighthouses you have to stay in the cottage next to it but you get to stay actually inside this amazing lighthouse. You have the whole lighthouse to yourself, from ground floor all the way up into the working light. Standing outside the beacon was beautiful. The owner Kevin is such a nice man, explained the history and all the nooks and crannies. Superb get away from it all with stunning views. It is beautifully and tastefully furnished inside, in a period taste. It was a surprise for my wife and she absolutely loved it.
Thank you Kevin for allowing us to stay in a piece of American history.

What an experience!
Having stayed a night last August for our 25th wedding anniversary, we loved this experience so much, I asked Nick, the mastermind who restored this historic landmark to the incredible gem it is today, "if you ever decide to sell, give me a shout..."  Never in a million years did I ever expect it to happen... as a result, I am honored to carry on his legacy in the restoration and ownership of this incredible piece of history!
Come "STAY the LIGHT!"

It was an incredible experience! The inside of lighthouse is decorated beautifully, it's immaculate and welcoming. Breathtaking views, and oh so peaceful! It's also well stocked with kitchen supplies and cleaning supplies. The owner Kevin sincerely wants you to enjoy everything. Mike, who took us out to LH, handled our bags and was ever so helpful.  He also brought us back to shore at the end of our stay, and was so sweet and patient.  An A +++

My husband and I just spent our 36 anniversary at Borden Flats (BF).
Kevin was in touch numerous times during our stay.
Paul took us out to BF and provided a wonderful tour and history.
Paul took photos of us as he was leaving BF.
Everything was beyond what we expected.  The decor was so charming and we felt at home.
Kevin was in touch with us numerous times and on departure day he provided photos taken by Paul.
What a nice keepsake to have the photos.
Staying in the actual lighthouse out in the water was awesome.
Away from the noise and lights was so relaxing.
Thank you Kevin for this special opportunity.
Thank you Paul for your friendly nature .
Anyone that ever wanted to stay in a lighthouse this is the one!!!

I absolutely loved this studio my son was young when he started as a dragon and Mike St and Jr as well as the rest of the instructors always made everyone feel like they belonged and were part of a big karate family
My kids and I have taken lessons here for years.  Great family-oriented school.  Highly recommend.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Roy, it's a pleasure having your family at our Studio!

review_text: This is the best place for kids! The entire staff is so good with them! It's also the best place for adults wanting to learn a martial art!
I have been taking classes here since September and the teaching staff has helped me fly through the ranks with classes 3 times a week and an amazing program!!

BEST STUDIO AROUND
WOULD NOT TAKE MY KIDDOS ANYWHERE ELSE.
wonderful family atmosphere :)

There good people
great place to bring your kids!
Great place..awesome people
